thread.title: Destiny Update 2.0 Is Coming Before West Coast Lunch Time
thread.title_full: Destiny Update 2.0 Is Coming Before West Coast Lunch Time - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Destiny Update 2.0 Is Coming Before West Coast Lunch Time
text: The major update 2.0 for Destiny is apparently set to be offered to gamers before games on the West Coast go to lunch, according to Deej, the community manager working on the social shooter at Bungie. His official Twitter account mentions Tuesday morning in another update, but he also says that he does not know a specific time because another team inside the studio is working on the actual deployment. A full list of patch notes associated with the update 2.0 for Â»
